Things to Do and
See at Catalina
One Day,
Sightseeing Features
GLASS BOTTOM BOAT TRIP
Most popular of all Catalina trips! You'll be fascinated by the strange
marine life and great variety of colorful fish you see clearly in the
waters below.
MOUNTAIN TERRACE DRIVE
From Avalon, you motor up mountain-terrace roads that afford mag-
nificent vistas - ever changing views from high above this colorful
cly and is sparkling blue bay.
SEAL COLONY BOAT TRIP
Be entertained by the showmen of the sea, the playful seals that
frolic along Catalina's rocky coast. This trip takes you to Catalina's
eastern tip.
SKYLINE DRIVE
This exciting trip combines outstanding views of Avalon with a
glimpse of Catalina's "Airport-in-the-Sky!"
Catalina asland
A UNIQUE ISLAND HOLIDAY
One of the West's most fascinating places, Santa Catalina Island,
lies just twenty minutes off the coast of Southern California via
CATALINA AIR LINES.
This 22 mile-long island... with its massive rolling hills and abound-
ing wild life (including buffalo herds, wild boar, and deer)... is
remniscent or me olo west. only win the sea aur around.
The picturesque town of Avalon on beautiful Avalon Bay still retains
the gracious atmosphere of Santa Catalina's early Spanish heritage.
And its sandy shores, crystal clear sea, and cliffs promise endless
hours of fun and adventure. It would take weeks to enjoy every-
thing, but even a day on the island is an unforgettable experience.
Make plans now for a Catalina Holiday of any length...and let
CATALINA AIM LING add sul more tun, time and pleasure to vour
trip. Fly on our DeHavilland Twin Otters to the Airport-in-the-Sky
high atop Catalina...or fly our world famous fleet of Grumman flying
boats...which land and take-off on the smooth waters of Avalon
Bay or Two Harbors.
Make it a complete day. Go early, stay late. Discover a whole new
world on Santa Catalina Island. Then fly back into the wonderland
of Southern California.
INLAND MOTOR TOUR
This trip takes you through miles of Catalina's rugged. mountainous
interior and along the breathtaking skyline drive overlooking the
cove-lined coast.
FLYING FISH BOAT TRIP
As 4U-million candlepower searchlishts sween trom the boatiowards
shore, flying fish soar up out of the water - sometimes land right
in the boat.
GOLF
Challenging 9-hole course with mountain and ocean views.
TENNIS
Fine concrete courts and all equipment available at clubhouse.
PICNICKING
Rustic shelters, tables and outdoor barbecue ovens in mountain and
seaside settings.
BOATING
Your choice of many types and sizes of boats for exploration and
fishing.
DIVING
Underwater vistas, abounding variety of fish, ship wrecks in crystal
clear water.
HUNTING
Big game hunting and bird hunting.
HIKING
Miles of picturesque trails.
FOR INFORMATION regarding all Catalina Island
activities and hotel or tour reservations, contact:
AVALON CHAMBER OF COMMERCE
P.O. Box 217, Avalon, California 90704
